overview: Tom Edwards has 20 years of finance and operational experience, including nine years with Ernst & Young. His executive background is diverse and includes entrepreneurial businesses in software development and services companies. After Ernst & Young, Edwards joined Recruiting Solutions, an applicant tracking SaaS company as the CFO/COO. Edwards helped lead the company through rapid growth and orchestrated a successful exit with a sale of the business to Ceridian Corporation. Subsequently, Edwards joined First Advantage, a NASDAQ company, as SVP of Operations for the background screening division. Edwards’ focus on process, workflows, and successful use of custom dashboards led to significant cost savings and quality improvements. At First Advantage, Edwards led a team of 400+ on three continents. Edwards was also the CFO of several venture capital-backed entrepreneurial companies. Edwards attended Purdue University and received his Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Rochester Institute of Technology.
